basic.description: A study of the relationship between the evolving cultural milieu and the theatre. Topics may include funding policies, practitioners' associations, equity, performance spaces, development of traditions.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Cultures of Theatre

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 4 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in DRAM300) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
